tables.name: Categories
tables.create: CREATE TABLE 'Categories' ( 'Id' INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, 'Name' TEXT NOT NULL, 'Notes' TEXT )

tables.name: Characters
tables.create: CREATE TABLE 'Characters' ( 'Id' INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, 'Name' TEXT NOT NULL, 'Strength' INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, 'Size' INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 1, 'Race' TEXT, 'Class' TEXT, 'Image' TEXT NOT NULL, 'Notes' TEXT )

tables.name: Items
tables.create: CREATE TABLE 'Items' ( 'Id' INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, 'Name' TEXT NOT NULL, 'Description' TEXT, 'Weight' REAL NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, 'Notes' TEXT, 'Image' TEXT, 'Category_Id' INTEGER, FOREIGN KEY('Category_Id') REFERENCES 'Categories'('Id') )

tables.name: Loads
tables.create: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS 'Loads' ( 'Id' INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, 'Strength' INTEGER NOT NULL, 'Light' REAL NOT NULL, 'Medium' REAL NOT NULL, 'Heavy' REAL NOT NULL )

tables.name: Tags
tables.create: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS 'Tags' ( 'Id' INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, 'Name' TEXT NOT NULL, 'Description' TEXT )

tables.name: Bag_Items
tables.create: CREATE TABLE 'Bag_Items' ( 'Id' INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, 'Bag_Id' INTEGER NOT NULL, 'Item_Id' INTEGER NOT NULL, 'Quantity' INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 1, 'IsModified' NUMERIC NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, 'Notes' TEXT, FOREIGN KEY('Bag_Id') REFERENCES 'Bags'('Id'), FOREIGN KEY('Item_Id') REFERENCES 'Items'('Id') )

tables.name: Character_Bags
tables.create: CREATE TABLE 'Character_Bags' ( 'Id' INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, 'Name' TEXT NOT NULL, 'Capacity' REAL, 'Weight' REAL NOT NULL, 'HasFixedWeight' NUMERIC NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, 'IsEquipped' NUMERIC NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, 'IsMain' NUMERIC NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, 'Image' TEXT, 'Character_Id' INTEGER NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY('Character_Id') REFERENCES 'Characters(Id)' )

tables.name: Item_Tags
tables.create: CREATE TABLE 'Item_Tags' ( 'Id' INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, 'Item_Id' INTEGER NOT NULL, 'Tag_Id' INTEGER NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY('Item_Id') REFERENCES 'Items'('Id'), FOREIGN KEY('Tag_Id') REFERENCES 'Tags'('Id') )
